plot: Documentary about master director Roberto Rossellini, who tells details of his life and childhood and visits the places where he has lived and shot some of his most famous movies.
title: Roberto Rossellini: Frammenti e battute
plot_es: Documentary about master director Roberto Rossellini, who tells details of his life and childhood and visits the places where he has lived and shot some of his most famous movies.
plot_en: Documentary about master director Roberto Rossellini, who tells details of his life and childhood and visits the places where he has lived and shot some of his most famous movies.

cast.role: Herself, Karin, Irene, Katherine, Joan of Arc
cast.name: Ingrid Bergman
